title.value: UK Core NHS Number Verification Status

description.value: A CodeSystem that identifies the trace status of an NHS Number with respect to a national source of NHS Numbers.

description.value: Filter to identify an applicable country for a concept

A UK country where the concept is known to be applicable based on the source information used to construct this CodeSystem as identified within the CodeSystem.identifier fields. In each case this can be one of: England | Scotland | Wales | Northern Ireland

display.value: Trace attempted - No match or multiple match found
Trace needs to be resolved - (NHS number or patient detail conflict)
Number not present and trace not required
Trace postponed (baby under six weeks old)
Number present and traced using Welsh NHS AR
